title: Fashion Designer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Design a costume in the likeness of a player
- Give a player a costume you’ve designed

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players who receive a costume from you will gain a random one time use ability from the role of who you designed your costume from.
- That player will also appear to be that role when investigated.

desc:
Post 5312
_“Here, try this on! It’ll look absolutely stunning on you!”_
